mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RR, RMEBER.* FROM (SELECT NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, PR_DATE, STOCK, IMAGE FROM SHOP_PRODUCT ORDER BY NO) RMEBER) A
WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(NO),0)+1 NO FROM SHOP_PRODUCT
INSERT INTO SHOP_PRODUCT(NO, NAME, PRICE, DETAIL, PR_DATE, STOCK, IMAGE) VALUES( #{no }, #{name }, #{price }, #{detail }, SYSDATE, #{stock }, #{image } )

update.foreach: UPDATE SHOP_PRODUCT SET STOCK=STOCK-#{item.quantity} WHERE NO=#{item.product_no}
